languages.text: "Хамаэ сар, лаэ кар, раум ка. Это значит: "Я принадлежу, я клянусь, смотри, Великий". Эту клятву на Ифрите приносят над водой те, кто встретил свое сердце. Ее дают один раз в жизни и навсегда, ибо что отразилось в водной глади, то отразилось в зрачке Великого". {n}Джай застенчиво отводит взгляд.{/n}

"Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vows once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хамаэ сар, лаэ кар, раум ка. Это значит: "Я принадлежу, я клянусь, смотри, Великий". Эту клятву на Ифрите приносят над водой те, кто встретил свое сердце. Ее дают один раз в жизни и навсегда, ибо что отразилось в водной глади, то отразилось в зрачке Великого". {n}Джай застенчиво отводит взгляд.{/n}

They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

"Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

languages.text: “哈马尔-萨，拉耶-卡，拉乌姆-卡。意思是‘我属于你，我发誓。请见证我的誓言，至高无上的神皇。’当艾弗里特的人们遇到此生的挚爱时，便会在水边许下这样的誓言。他们一生中只会发一次誓，而这誓言将会永远铭记在心。因为倒映在水面上的一切，都会映入至高无上的神皇眼中。”{n}婕伊羞涩地移开了目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “哈马尔-萨，拉耶-卡，拉乌姆-卡。意思是‘我属于你，我发誓。请见证我的誓言，至高无上的神皇。’当艾弗里特的人们遇到此生的挚爱时，便会在水边许下这样的誓言。他们一生中只会发一次誓，而这誓言将会永远铭记在心。因为倒映在水面上的一切，都会映入至高无上的神皇眼中。”{n}婕伊羞涩地移开了目光。{/n}

languages.text: 「ハマエ・サー、ラエ・カー、ラウム・カー。『私はあなたのもの。私は誓う、見よ、エグザルテッド・ワンよ』という意味なんだ。イフリートの水の上で、人々が誓いを交わす言葉。彼らはそこで、永遠を誓い合うんだ…水面にうつるものはすべて、エグザルテッド・ワンの目に映るから」{n}ジェイは照れたように目線を逸らす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ハマエ・サー、ラエ・カー、ラウム・カー。『私はあなたのもの。私は誓う、見よ、エグザルテッド・ワンよ』という意味なんだ。イフリートの水の上で、人々が誓いを交わす言葉。彼らはそこで、永遠を誓い合うんだ…水面にうつるものはすべて、エグザルテッド・ワンの目に映るから」{n}ジェイは照れたように目線を逸らす。{/n}

languages.text: «Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. Significa "Te pertenezco, te juro y te observo, Exaltado". Es un juramento que presta la gente sobre el agua en Efreet al conocer a su amor. Es un juramento que solo se hace una vez en la vida y es para siempre, puesto que lo que se refleja en la superficie del agua se refleja también en el ojo del Exaltado». {n}Jae aparta tímidamente la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. Significa "Te pertenezco, te juro y te observo, Exaltado". Es un juramento que presta la gente sobre el agua en Efreet al conocer a su amor. Es un juramento que solo se hace una vez en la vida y es para siempre, puesto que lo que se refleja en la superficie del agua se refleja también en el ojo del Exaltado». {n}Jae aparta tímidamente la mirada.{/n}

languages.text: « "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka." Ce qui signifie : "Je suis à vous, je m'y engage, l'Exalté m'en soit témoin." C'est un serment que les gens d'Éfrit prononcent sur l'eau lorsqu'ils rencontrent leur âme sœur. C'est un événement unique au cours de leur vie et ce vœu est éternel, car ce qui se reflète à la surface de l'eau se reflète également dans l'œil de l'Exalté. » {n}Jae détourne timidement le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka." Ce qui signifie : "Je suis à vous, je m'y engage, l'Exalté m'en soit témoin." C'est un serment que les gens d'Éfrit prononcent sur l'eau lorsqu'ils rencontrent leur âme sœur. C'est un événement unique au cours de leur vie et ce vœu est éternel, car ce qui se reflète à la surface de l'eau se reflète également dans l'œil de l'Exalté. » {n}Jae détourne timidement le regard.{/n}

languages.text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. Es bedeutet: 'Ich schwöre, ich bin Euer, schaut hin, Erhabener.' Das ist ein Schwur, den Menschen auf Efreet über Wasser leisten, wenn sich ihre Herzen begegnen. Sie leisten diesen Schwur einmal im Leben und dann gilt er für immer – denn was sich auf der Wasseroberfläche spiegelt, spiegelt sich auch im Auge des Erhabenen." {n}Jae wendet schüchtern ihren Blick ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

Das ist ein Schwur, den Menschen auf Efreet über Wasser leisten, wenn sich ihre Herzen begegnen. Sie leisten diesen Schwur einmal im Leben und dann gilt er für immer – denn was sich auf der Wasseroberfläche spiegelt, spiegelt sich auch im Auge des Erhabenen." {n}Jae wendet schüchtern ihren Blick ab.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vow once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

languages.text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka... 'Ben seninim, yemin ediyorum, Görkemli şahidim.' demek. İfrit'te kalpleri bir araya gelen insanlar, bu yemini suyun üzerinde eder. Yemini hayatlarında bir kez ederler. Bu yemin sonsuza kadar geçerlidir zira sudaki yansımalar, Görkemli'nin gözlerine yansır." {n}Jae, utangaçça başka tarafa bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. It means 'I am yours, I vow, behold, Exalted One.' It is a vow people say over water on Efreet when they meet their heart. They make the vows once in their lives and it is forever — for what is reflected in the water's surface is reflected in the eye of the Exalted One." {n}Jae shyly looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hamae sar, lae kar, raum ka. 'Ben seninim, yemin ediyorum, şahit ol buna Görkemli.' demek. İfrit'te kalpleri bir araya gelen insanlar bu yemini suyun üzerinde eder. Yemini hayatlarında bir kez ederler ve bu yemin sonsuza kadar geçerlidir. Çünkü sudaki yansımalar, Görkemli'nin gözlerine yansır." {n}Jae utangaçça başka tarafa bakıyor.{/n}
